Platform-agnostic autonomous AI agent that executes tasks using LLM-based reasoning, tool invocation, and memory access. Deployable on AWS AgentCore, Azure AI Agent Service, Microsoft Copilot Studio, or self-hosted environments using frameworks like LangGraph, Strands, Semantic Kernel, or AutoGen
